New_Brunswick.North Brunswick Township High School:
For other schools named Brunswick High School see Brunswick High School (disambiguation).
For the school in North Carolina, see North Brunswick High School
North Brunswick Township High School (NBTHS) is a four-year comprehensive public high school located in North Brunswick, in Middlesex County, New Jersey, United States, serving students in ninth through twelfth grades as the lone secondary school of the North Brunswick Township Public Schools. The school is accredited by the Middle States Association of Colleges and Schools Commission on Secondary Schools.
